wikipedia_page.main: Denis Pearce (8 April 1896 – 3 July 1968) was a British fencer. He competed at the 1928 and 1936 Summer Olympics.

response: * Thomas Wand-Tetley, Robert Montgomerie, Frederick Sherriff, Denis Pearce, Charles Simey, Jack James
